fields.label: Upload Ebook
fields.name: fictioneer_story_ebook_upload_one
fields.instructions: If the ePUB converter is not working for you or you want other formats, you can upload your own ebook file here. This will replace the automatically generated ePUB and always show up on the story page. Allowed formats include epub, mobi, ibooks, azw, azw3, kf8, kfx, pdf, iba, and txt.
fields.mime_types: epub, mobi, ibooks, azw, azw3, kf8, kfx, pdf, iba, txt, rtf

fields.label: ePUB Preface
fields.name: fictioneer_story_epub_preface
fields.instructions: Required for the download link to show up. This will be displayed on a separate page in the ePUB between cover and table of contents. Disclaimers, copyright notes, fandoms, tags, and other front matters go here. For example: "This is a work of fiction. Any resemblance to actual persons..." and so forth.

fields.label: ePUB Afterword
fields.name: fictioneer_story_epub_afterword
fields.instructions: This will be shown after the last chapter. Thanks and personal thoughts on the story go here.

fields.label: ePUB Custom CSS
fields.name: fictioneer_story_epub_custom_css
fields.instructions: Inject CSS code into the ePUB to customize the style for your story. For advanced users.
